Search:
Fera wants to visit all of the wells in Hyrule
and asked you to tell her the <clr:0000>locations of any
wells<clr:ffff> that you know. She said she is going to
go see the Lookout Landing Well.

There are a total of <clr:0000><sp:2:e:2e:2800570065006c006c0044006900730063006f007600650072004e0075006d0054006f00740061006c00ffff00cd> wells<clr:ffff> in Hyrule. So far,
you've told her the locations of <clr:0000><sp:2:e:30:2a00570065006c006c005200650070006f00720074004e0075006d004d0069006e00750073004f006e006500ffff00cd> of them<clr:ffff>.
Name: Where Are the Wells?
Complete:
You told Fera the locations of all the wells in
Hyrule. She was delighted and said she intends
to set out on a journey to visit all of them.
